action_points.description: Develop and implement a dynamic cyber risk management framework that includes specific plans for AI-enhanced phishing, ransomware, and critical infrastructure protection, with regular updates based on emerging threats.
Establish a continuous cybersecurity training program for all employees focusing on the latest threat vectors, including AI-enhanced phishing and ransomware awareness.
Invest in advanced threat detection and response technologies that can adapt to and mitigate the risks associated with sophisticated cyber-attacks and vulnerabilities in critical infrastructure.
